message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'd really appreciate. My asking price is $95. Let me know what you think!
I'm not sure I can go up to $90
Bob, I appreciate your offer.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $90. This would still leave me a decent profit, and I think it's a fair price for the value this product provides you.
I'm not sure I can go up to $89
Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but $86 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to go down to $88. Let's make this happen!
I'm not sure I can go up to $87
